message.content:
cs.CC, cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.CG, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the construction of PCPs, which is a topic in computational complexity theory (cs.CC). The construction is based on combinatorial and graph-theoretic techniques, which are often used in information theory (cs.IT), data structures (cs.DS), and computational geometry (cs.CG). The paper also discusses the extension of the construction to yield a decodable PCP, which is a topic in machine learning and theoretical computer science (cs.LG).
